___trapNumber.description: All OviTraps have a unique trap number, add number here if applicable.
___trapNumber.title: Trap Number

___problem.description: Additional comments according to mosquito problem found at geolocation.
___problem.title: Problem Comment

___problemIndoorOutdoor.description: select option if the mosquito problem is Indoor or Outdoor
___problemIndoorOutdoor.title: Outdoor/Indoor Problem

___geoLocation.description: Geolocation where the data was collected
___geoLocation.title: GeoLocation

___eggCount.description: the number of eggs detected on the OviTrap
___eggCount.title: Egg Count OviTrap

___comments.description: An explanation and additional comments of users.
___comments.title: Title of 'root.*.comments' Type: 'string'

___time.description: Time when the data is collected
___time.title: Time

___problemIndoorOutdoorSituation.description: An explanation for problem situation (indoor or outdoor)
___problemIndoorOutdoorSituation.title: Indoor/Outdoor Situation

___cityName.description: Name of the City where the data was collected
___cityName.title: City

___collectionType.description: Select Local for a local accessment of the Mosquito Problem and OviTrap for an assessment of egg count.
___collectionType.title: OviTrap/Local

___date.description: Date when the data is collected
___date.title: Date

___username.description: An explanation for 'root.*.username' about the purpose of string instance with editor path 'root.*.username'.
___username.title: Username
